modName: LOTR Crown of the King Elessar
summary: Crown based on the LotR Rotk movie.
descriptionHtml:
[i]First of all, I know that's not exactly the same crown, but I think it's just a small detail.[/i]
My first project using Zbrush so I decide to share it with community.

 - High resolution textures.
 - Can be crafted in the jewellery section.
 - Stats are based on normal circlets stats.

[b]Credits to the BGS gondor armor http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43641/?

[/b][i][u][size=3]My other mods
